title: Chipotle Will Benefit as Avocados Get Cheaper. It Still Isn’t a Buy, Analyst Says.
text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill stock has soared in 2019, and while Maxim isn’t ready to jump into the shares ahead of next week’s earnings report, the firm does think that some trends are moving in the burrito chain’s favor.

The back story. Chipotle stock (ticker: CMG) has jumped 93% year to date, well ahead of the S&P 500’s 18% gain. The company is trying out new menu items, adding ways to order online, and delivering strong earnings. All that has brought Chipotle plenty of praise, even from formerly bearish analysts.

...
description: Maxim isn’t ready to jump into the stock ahead of next week’s earnings report, but the firm does think that some trends are moving in the burrito chain’s favor.
